#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int My_Reverse(long long int num)
{
    int i,temp,rem,power=1,sum=0;
    while(num)
    {
        temp=num%10;
        sum=sum*power+temp;
        power=10;
        num=num/10;
    }
    return sum;
}
bool IS_Pallindrome(long long int num)
{
    char a[25];
    int i=0;
    while(num)
    {
        a[i++]=num%10-'0';
        num/=10;

    }
    a[i]='\0';
    for(int j=0;j<i;j++,i--)
        if(a[j]!=a[i-1])
        return 0;
    return 1;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
     long long int num,rev;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> num;
       long long int count=0;
       while(!IS_Pallindrome(num))
       {
           rev=My_Reverse(num);
          // cout << rev <<"asd \n";
           num+=rev;
           count++;
       }
       cout << count <<" "<<num <<"\n";

    }
    return 0;
}
